Uses of Class
org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerGroup

  • Packages that use SerializerGroup 
    Package Description
    org.apache.juneau.serializer
    Serializer API
    org.apache.juneau.server
    REST Servlet API

    • Uses of SerializerGroup in org.apache.juneau.serializer

      Methods in org.apache.juneau.serializer that return SerializerGroup 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.addImplClass(Class<T> interfaceClass, Class<? extends T> implClass)
      Shortcut for calling Serializer.addImplClass(Class, Class) on all serializers in this group.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.addNotBeanClasses(Class<?>... classes)
      Shortcut for calling Serializer.addNotBeanClasses(Class[]) on all serializers in this group.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.addTransforms(Class<?>... classes)
      Shortcut for calling Serializer.addTransforms(Class[]) on all serializers in this group.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.append(Class<? extends Serializer>... s)
      Registers the specified serializers with this group.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.append(Class<? extends Serializer> c)
      Same as append(Class[]), except specify a single class to avoid unchecked compile warnings.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.clone()
      Clones this group and all serializers in this group.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.lock()
      Locks this group and all serializers in this group.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.setProperties(ObjectMap properties)
      Shortcut for calling CoreApi.setProperties(ObjectMap) on all serializers in this group.
      SerializerGroup SerializerGroup.setProperty(String property, Object value)
      Shortcut for calling Serializer.setProperty(String, Object) on all serializers in this group.

    • Uses of SerializerGroup in org.apache.juneau.server

      Methods in org.apache.juneau.server that return SerializerGroup 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected SerializerGroup RestServlet.createSerializers(ObjectMap properties, Class<?>[] transforms)
      Creates the serializer group containing serializers used for serializing output POJOs in HTTP responses.
      SerializerGroup RestResponse.getSerializerGroup()
      Gets the serializer group for the response.
      SerializerGroup RestRequest.getSerializerGroup()
      Returns the serializers associated with this request.
      SerializerGroup RestServlet.getSerializers()
      Returns the serializer group containing serializers used for serializing output POJOs in HTTP responses.
